name: The Hickory
description: The Hickory is known for its slow-smoked barbecue, gourmet burgers, and rustic, relaxed atmosphere.

name: Da Pineapple Grill
description: Da Pineapple Grill brings a taste of the islands to Rexburg with Hawaiian-inspired dishes and sushi.

name: Original Thai
description: Authentic Thai cuisine featuring flavorful curries, noodle dishes, and vegetarian options in a cozy setting.

name: Pizza Pie Café
description: A family-friendly buffet offering a wide selection of pizzas, pasta, and salads at an affordable price.

name: Millhollow Frozen Yogurt & Deli
description: Popular for its frozen yogurt and sandwiches, Millhollow is a casual spot for a quick and tasty meal.

name: The Crepery
description: The Crepery offers sweet and savory crepes along with a cozy, coffee-shop ambiance.

name: Righteous Slice
description: Righteous Slice is a wood-fired pizza restaurant offering fresh, artisan pizzas made with locally sourced ingredients.

name: McDonald's
description: Fast food chain offering classic burgers, fries, and breakfast options in a family-friendly environment.

name: Taco Bell
description: Mexican-inspired fast food featuring tacos, burritos, and other customizable meals.

name: Wendy's
description: Fast food chain known for its square burgers, fresh salads, and the famous Frosty dessert.

name: Subway
description: Popular fast-food chain offering customizable sandwiches, salads, and wraps made fresh.

name: Burger King
description: Home of the Whopper, Burger King offers a variety of flame-grilled burgers, chicken sandwiches, and sides.
